description: RPGamer's weekly podcast looks at the latest happenings in the world of Role Playing Games. From video to pen and paper, all is fair game as we go through the week's news, latest releases, and reviews to keep you up to date on the best gaming genre out there.
title: RPG Cast

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 562: “Don’t Disgaea Shame Me”
episodes.description: It's Extra Life 2020. Chris is dying in Hades. Anna Marie thinks orange is pretty sus. Kelley can't let go of Laharl. Josh is back on the Trails. And Alex is outta here to pursue his new racing career.
categories: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV
World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 561: “Pour Some Syrup on Me”
episodes.description: We're rounding up two weeks of news with Robert, Kelley, Jonathan, Chris, and Anna Marie.  Everything is delayed, so in response everything else is...also delayed...?  Can we just cancel the rest of 2020 and skip right to next year, please?
categories: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV
World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 560: “Kmart Breath of the Wild”
episodes.description: The cast regulars (Anna Marie, Chris and Kelley) are joined by Robert and newcomer Corey to discuss this week's news. A heated debate about free-to-play mechanics breaks out as the crew is split on Genshin Impact and other mobile titles while Chris eats chocolate covered almonds. Three weeks to go until Extra Life!
categories: World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 559: “He Doesn’t Seem to Be Dead?”
episodes.description: Robert joins the cast again as Alex, Anna Marie, and Chris get ready for Extra Life 2020!  There’s a lot of embargoed gaming going on this week, but we still manage to round up all the important news of the week for your entertainment.  We’re counting down to November 7th with plenty of enthusiasm.
categories: Fairy Fencer F: Advent Dark Force

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 558: “Never Get on a Boat With Dad”
episodes.description: Pascal surprises everyone. New challenger Robert appears. Josh makes a triumphant return. Anna Marie leaves to go do important kitten things. Kelley proves she's the best at the Mario's. And Chris still says it's not really an Ys game.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 557: “PS5 Crunchwrap Supreme!”
episodes.description: This week we finally figure out if Dark Souls ripped off Breath of the Wild. We also get really worked up over Bethesda. When is Game Pass coming to PS5, again?
categories: World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 556: “Chris Is Right for Once!”
episodes.description: It’s an extra large podcast this week. Alex, Kelley, Nathan, Chris, and Anna Marie break down all they’ve been playing. A huge news week is covered with colourful commentary. And we go off on more than one tangent. Help us, we’re incorrigible.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 555: “Kelley Just Wants to Fight You”
episodes.description: Anna Marie briefly stops by to tell us about what she's been playing while recovering. The Series X has a price now, will the PS5 get one this week? Also, PAX is happening!
categories: Dragon Quest II: Luminaries of the Legendary Line

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 554: “Cat Smoker Meow”
episodes.description: Jonathan Stringer joins this week and helps Major Tomcat recruit Kelley and Chris for a PC RPG. Chris will likely just hack the planet instead. Kelley, meanwhile, will tend to her cat's bad habits.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 553: “Greasing the Marbles”
episodes.description: As Chris and Anna Marie work out where the Romulan Neutral Zone is in their bed, Kelley steps in to host the show. There's also marbles. Time to go date some dog owners.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 552: “Aw ***t, She’s Playing Diablo!”
episodes.description: This week we learn not to disturb Kelley's special demon slaying time, get too attached to dogs in games, or disturb the Harvest Moon plushie announcement. We also get your suggestions for series that need to be resurrected. Enjoy Action RPG August!
categories: Story of Seasons: Friends of Mineral Town
The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 551: “I Don’t Want the Moe Future”
episodes.description: Join Anna Marie, Chris, Josh, and Kelley this week, as things get a little weirder than usual. A sticky soda fracas kicks off the show. Meanwhile, Kelley runs the news section for the first time, which is good since Chris stomps off after discovering this is definitely the worst timeline of them all. And don't forget, #JRPGJuly continues for one more week!

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 550: “Gamer Girl Glue”
episodes.description: The last two weeks have had an interesting mix of news, and it just might break Chris by the end of the show. Anna Marie is hijacking the Question of the Week, but it's definitely a unique question! Alex stealths his way into the cast alongside Kelley and Peter. How is it still only July?
categories: Story of Seasons: Friends of Mineral Town
The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 549: “What’s in Your Cranny?”
episodes.description: The RPG Cast has dived head first into #JRPGJuly in our now playing, but since the new month has rolled over, that also means new bugs and fish to catch in Animal Crossing as well!  We've got a slew of editorial content to discuss and a smattering of news.  Stay safe during the holiday weekend!
categories: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 548: “Do Not Karen on Me”
episodes.description: New Game Plus Expo comprises the bulk of this week’s news, while the crew ponders their love and hate for Phantasy Star Online 2. Just what has Anna Marie been playing the last two weeks? You’ll have to listen to the episode to find out!

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 547: “Cancer Inducing External Hardrive”
episodes.description: The best way to predict the review score of a game is to play a demo of it. So never trouble another for what you can do yourself. For every minute you are playing you lose sixty seconds of ignorance. And without Pokémon tooth brushing games, life would be a mistake.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 546: “Sugar Coated Turd”
episodes.description: Before we go pre-order all the games from Steve, we get a podcast up for you. Chris and Kelley complain about Civ 6 on Switch. Johnathan rages in some streets. And Josh is trying to find where to turn all his sidequests into. Ok, we're off to go be feline couriers.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 545: “Did You Infect My Game With Harvest Moon?”
episodes.description: With many media events getting pushed back, the news is a little trim this week. But we still manage to pull together our basket of zany personalities for a podcast we hope brings a smile to your face.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 544: “You Will NOT Bucket Shame Me”
episodes.description: Things are looking grim: we get thrown out cars, assassinated for our kingdoms, drowned underwater, and struck out. If you’re scratching your head, don’t worry! Everything will make sense once you listen to this week’s podcast.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 543: “Go Find Gnome, Dumb***”
episodes.description: It’s a slightly more potty mouthed cast than usual, as Alice joins Peter, Kelley, Anna Marie and Chris to discuss what the cast has been playing for the week. Anna Marie’s 5-hour rule resurfaces and we explore what crazy black holes Chris has been down this week, alongside the news and your feedback.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 542: “Hell House? Hold My Beer”
episodes.description: There's not a ton of news right now, which isn't a big surprise considering the current challenges of making games. Instead we deep dive into our current games, with Jonathan, Josh, Kelley and Peter leading the charge. Anna Marie and Chris share hosting duties to wrap up this week's panel.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 541: “Let Him Explain!”
episodes.description: We’re back with a juicy show to kick off May. Alex, Chris, Josh, and Kelley join host Anna Marie for a catch-up segment of what we’ve all been playing for the last two weeks.  News of the last two weeks gets a little weird as games are being delayed left and right, yet Indivisible somehow gets released early? What a weird world we live in.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 540: “Dooting While I Was Muting”
episodes.description: Alex, Josh, Kelley, and Peter join hosts Chris and Anna Marie for a lively show, but be warned: CONTAINS PERSONA 5 ROYAL AND FINAL FANTASY 7 REMAKE SPOILERS in the Now Playing section.  Beyond that, the panel discusses news of the day, including the bizarre Cooking Mama drama.  Hey, that rhymes!

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 539: “Call Me Goku Because I’m About to Ride a Cloud”
episodes.description: Alex, Kelley, Nathan, and Peter have all descended into the slums of Midgar, so the Final Fantasy VII Remake dominates our Now Playing, but Anna Marie still manages to answer a question left over from last week about Persona 5 Royal.  Our listeners recount their memories of the original FF7 and we even manage to squeak in some news of the week too.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 538: “Flat Milk”
episodes.description: We've let the boys sleep in this week!  Alice, Anna Marie and Kelley rock the LadyCast this week, discussing their creepy Animal Crossing denizens, April Fool's, which industry CEO is a giant jerk, and the big release of the month.
categories: World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 537: “Shady Turnip Deal”
episodes.description: Peter, Kelley, Chris, and Anna Marie are joined by Alice this week; while she didn’t deliver any missiles, large robots may be a part of the podcast in unexpected ways!  We discuss cheating on the stalk market, the news of the week, and your feedback.  Now to wait for our copies of Persona 5 Royal to arrive...hurry up already!
categories: SD Gundam G Generation Cross Rays
The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 536: “When We Get Back to Work We’re Building a Box Fort”
episodes.description: Guest star Sam Watcher joins us, and that means this week's podcast is officially explicit!  Between the occasion cuss bomb, we discuss Animal Crossing and Chris' poor decision making, Alex's dive into Persona 5 Royal, and exactly why Kelley needs to finish FF7: Crisis Core in the near future.  Anna Marie and Peter round out the 'cast crew this week as we dive into the weekly headlines along with your feedback.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 535: “Hand-Washing Song”
episodes.description: We’re all cooped up, but that doesn’t mean the video game news stops!  Well, it actually was a little slimmer this week, but Anna Marie, Chris, Jonathan, Kelley, and Peter still have plenty of games to discuss.  We also have an impromptu hand-washing sing-along?
categories: Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia
World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 534: “Dr. Thunder Fallout”
episodes.description: We missed you all last week, but we’re back with a bunch of hot topics, including the FF7R demo, Dragon Quest of the Stars, and which alien Kelley got busy with in Mass Effect.  Anna Marie gets really confused about review scores, and we can’t really decide when a Millennial starts and a Gen-X ends.  Of course, none of that matters because Animal Crossing is almost here!

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 533: “Oops, All Dead People”
episodes.description: This RPG Cast was recorded in the dark before a dead studio audience. Josh fails at Fire Emblem. Jonathan becomes a rock star. Kelley pines for Garrus. Chris gets spooked. And Anna Marie harvests squid poop. Yeah it's a weird show.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 532: “Meowls”
episodes.description: Anna Marie is finally back (and a little loopy on painkillers).  There’s ample fawning for Mass Effect in our Now Playing, as Kelley chooses an unusual romantic encounter!  Arguments break out over March and April’s packed release schedule, but a truce is eventually reached.
categories: The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance Tactics
The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 531: “Postage Stamp Emblem”
episodes.description: While you're going to gaming jail, you'll want to listen to our show so you know what games to bring with you. Fallout 76 has a new update, perhaps it'll be a good choice for you. Phantasy Star Online 2 had a wonderful beta, maybe it's the way to go. Unfortunately, Metal Max Xeno: Reborn was delayed so you'll have to wait a bit for that one.
categories: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 530: “Look, It Has Red XIII in It, Just Buy It”
episodes.description: Today we learned that Pokémon Home may rival Kingdom Hearts for difficult to understand stories. The Switch is finally getting some Outer Worlds love. And Anna Marie passes a kidney stone. Well not live on the show or anything. I'm just really tired of waiting for this stupid stoooooh...we're still recording? Um...enjoy the show everyone!

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 529: “Game of the Year 2019 – Pandacide”
episodes.description: Woop woop! Explicit alert! This get a bit unclean as we try to figure out our Game of the Year picks for 2019. We find out just what you can get done with slave labor. We learn the true martial power of haircuts. And we finally realize Anna Marie shouldn't be allowed to keep animals.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 528: “I Demand An Explanation”
episodes.description: Whether it be about spanking sounds or male pasties, RPGamer has a long history of being an authoritative source of information. That said, we're still trying to figure out what version of EarthBound Kelley is playing.
categories: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky SC
World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 527: “Chris Should Play Nier Automata”
episodes.description: It's Alice's first appearance of the decade!  Ther crew is rounded out by Alex, Anna Marie, Chris, Kelley and Peter who are back to discuss your treasured memories of the last decade, as well as the news, reviews, and releases from the last few weeks.  Wasn't there supposed to be a break from releases...?
categories: Final Fantasy IV: The After Years
Final Fantasy IV: The Complete Collection

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 526: “Slightly Smaller Than Your Average Spoon or Fork”
episodes.description:
We're back and better* than ever! On this special episode of the RPGCast we do a deeper dive into what we've been playing and discuss our holiday hauls.

*Note: RPG Cast 526 may not actually be better than any other previous RPG Cast.
categories: Final Fantasy XII: The Zodiac Age
The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel II
The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 525: “Schrödinger’s Phoenix”
episodes.description: It's the final podcast of the decade!  Alex, Anna Marie, Chris, Kelley and Peter end the year with a bang...and maybe a whimper too.  News, your lists of top DS games, and what we're going to play to ring in the new year.  See you in 2020!
categories: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 524: “Overhead Isometricy Game”
episodes.description: Alex, Johnathan, and Chris run through the past two weeks of news, bemoan the lack of time to play games, and then commit to not trying to play anything new. Ring Fit Adventure wins RPG of the year. But seriously, why isn't Shining Force II on that thing?

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 523: “He’s Big Enough for Both of Us to Pet”
episodes.description: We're all Pokécrazy this week, with  Alex, Anna Marie, Chris, Kelley and Peter all discussing their Pokétales and where the series could go moving forward.  Josh is the odd man out, but he's got interesting demos to share instead, so it's cool.  Wait, wasn't this supposed to be a short show?!
categories: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III
World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 522: “Pants at Finding My Way Around”
episodes.description: Alright folks, it's out so it's time to feel out if the Dexit folks were right or wrong. We also hear about Path of Exile 2 and more RPG news than you'd expect at this time of year. But let's be honest, we just want to go back to leveling up our starters.

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 521: “Upsell You to Unlimited Meows”
episodes.description: We figured it would be a short show because there's not a lot of news this time of year.  Turns out Alex, Kelley, Peter, Chris, and Anna Marie still had plenty to discuss with their now playing, your feedback, and the upcoming releases including Pokémon.
categories: Conception Plus: Maidens of the Twelve Stars
World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 520: “Spider Sores”
episodes.description: This week, Anna Marie is so excited about Blizzcon that she totally forgets the order of the show!  Chris, Kelley, Peter, and Josh somehow still cover what we're playing, news, and new releases...eventually, anyways.
categories: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III

episodes.title: RPG Cast – Episode 519: “Sommersaulting Cat Buses”
episodes.description: Jonathan crashes the RPGCast this week because he heard that Chris, Anna Marie, Kelley, Peter, and Nathan were dissing on Tactics Ogre.  We also discuss child care our Now Playing. But don't worry, while the news is slim, it's also pleasantly robust.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 518: “Cohesive Beginning, Middle, and End”
episodes.description: This week, Alex and Anna Marie can talk about their embargoed games, Peter finishes a game, and Chris worries about his cats. Kelley’s question of the week leads us down rabbit holes we probably shouldn’t have explored, but we’re doing it live and that’s how we roll.
categories: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III
The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 517: “Sonic and the Holograms”
episodes.description: Not much news, but there are many games out this week. We won't play any of them though. Alice is on about Space Station 13, Kelley re-upped World of Warcraft, Anna Marie is playing Dragon Quest III, and Chris is still playing Final Fantasy IV.
categories: World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 516: “Listening to Link Drown Is the Cutest Thing”
episodes.description: While Chris destroys Anna Marie's right joycon (press R to pay respects), the rest of the cast discusses their now playing, the news of the week, and there are still far too many games releasing every week.  Please save us.
categories: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III
The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 515: “Jerky Goose Things”
episodes.description: HONK! This week’s RPGCast has almost everyone playing a different game. HONK! We also discuss plenty of news and your feedback. HONK!
categories: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 514: “Holy **** a 12-slot bag!!!”
episodes.description: What’s old is new again as we deep dive into WoW Classic and how the heck did we even get onto this topic again?  News from TGS, what games you’re playing in September, and even more releases coming in the second half of the month, please pity our reviewers.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 513: “Cream Cheese Crisis”
episodes.description: We're back from PAX and have forty impressions to share with you. We got a cat, Peter's getting a baby, Kelley's getting a vacation, Alice got a ring, and Alex got Musou-ed.
categories: Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 512: “I Gave Hubert A Teddy Bear And He Burned It”
episodes.description: While Fire Emblem: Three Houses seems to finally be put aside by most folks, a few are still learning the dangerous pitfalls of gift giving. As usual, cats and Robin Williams are discussed. Then someone pre-orders Pantsu Hunter and someone else tries to shove CDs into an iPhone to get monsters.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 511: “Tit For Tat”
episodes.description: Remember your lost days of innocence? Neither do we. Peter, Kelley, Josh, Matt, Chris, and Anna Marie all prove they shouldn't be trusted with a podcast this week. Then we investigate whether...oh no, look out! Fraulein!

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 510: “The Anna Marie Seal Of Mediocrity”
episodes.description: We hope you’re not sick of Fire Emblem: Three Houses from last week, because we’ve got even more this episode.  We discuss strategies for raising professor rank and recruiting, in case you need some tips.  We also cover a variety of games and their official release dates. Finally, our briefs are more like long underwear this week.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 509: “I Need A Guide”
episodes.description: Johnathan, Nathan, and Chris try to figure out the code running behind Fire Emblem: Three Houses. Yokai Watch is coming out again. China has a bunch of cool RPGs. And Persona 5 Royal leaks some more details!

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 508: “I Need Waifus”
episodes.description: Fire Emblem Three Houses released this week and we're (almost) all playing it - but there's a bit of controversy afoot.  Pascal talks about poor choices he's made in other games. And the news section is all twisty, tumbly, and turvy.  Now back to our respective waifus, husbandos, and depressing games...sos.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 507: “Are You Even A Gamer?”
episodes.description: Chris got kicked off his own show this week to make room for a panel full to bursting with #JRPGJuly updates! Some are playing new games, some are playing old games, but let’s face it - everyone will be playing Fire Emblem next week.
categories: Marvel: Ultimate Alliance 3: the Black Order

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 506: “Luigi Tries His Hardest”
episodes.description: We’re back from our mini-vacation and #JRPGJuly is in full swing. Now playing includes praise for Persona Q2, FF14, and Atelier Lulua. We're also impressed with how everyone agrees in the feedback section. Now I must go find Chris and comfort him as he laments Marle.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 505: “We’ll Just Postpone It Every Week”
episodes.description: Anna Marie loses her mind as well as control of her mouth. Chris investigates the impacts of bringing Diet Coke into Mementos. Peter buys more games. Nathan finishes Final Fanatasy VIII just in time to start playing Final Fantasy VIII. And Kelley just tries to survive Bloodstained's framerate on the Switch.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 504: “Officially Canon Girl”
episodes.description: A post-E3 slump won’t get this podcast down!  The RPG Cast chats about Judgment, discusses what little news did trickle in during the week, and looks ahead to an exciting #JRPGJuly.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 503: “Goku Twerking At Fish”
episodes.description: Goku got moves. Square Enix got the dollar bills. Keanu got a fandom. And you got a really long post E3 podcast. Now go teach those youngsters how the weapon triangle works.
categories: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel II
The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 502: “#Chickenshame”
episodes.description: Kelly commits fowl atrocities. Chris gets satisfied. Josh does a musical number. Pascal takes a cold steel shower. And Peter is streaming now at mixer.com/peterthomas6!

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 501: “Why Gato No Swim?”
episodes.description: After the giant Show 500 last week, we’re back to a more normal format. A robust Minecraft discussion during Now Playing precedes news including first hints of things being shown at E3. We also discuss your feedback and this week’s releases include a game both Kelley and Anna Marie are very excited for!

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 500: “Prince’s Woof-fu”
episodes.description: Today we celebrate 500 episodes of fun with memories and clips you picked. While we don’t know why you keep listening, we’re sure glad that you do. Here’s to 500 more and our apologies that we still don’t have that dang horse for sale.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 499: “Kung Fu Maids”
episodes.description: It's the final countdown! Chris and Anna Marie are joined by regular Kelley and irregular Jonathan, who always brings interesting games and hardware to discuss. April Fool's just passed, and several companies got silly. We also considered piles of feedback in the Question of the Week. We'll miss you all, see you in six weeks.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 498: “Bi-Kirby-ous”
episodes.description: A party of four puts on our thinking hats, contemplating games we haven’t played – and which we should tackle in a packed April. Surprise...

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 497: “Git Gud Or Git A Refund”
episodes.description: A slightly smaller show doesn’t mean any less action, news, or hilariously questionable jibes for this week’s RPGCast. We learn we cannot, in fact, git...

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 496: “Painful Sneeze Out Of Ten”
episodes.description: We’re joined by a new staffer (Peter) this week for a HUGE cast! We set off a KEMCO alert with massively overpriced DLC, we’re accidentally...

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 495: “Kingdom Hearts Crisis Line”
episodes.description: We’re all coughing, sniffling, and feeling terrible, but we love you and still wanted to record our weekly podcast. Join us as we get simultaneously excited and confused about…well…everything going on in March? This is going to be a busy month for RPGamers!

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 494: “Unfortunate Nay”
episodes.description: This week’s cast discusses what foibles can hold back a game, including not being able to connect and bad translations. We also dive into DLC...

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 493: “Skunk Trapper”
episodes.description: You won’t get skunked this week with a full-fledged RPGCast! We dissect the recent Nintendo Direct (BOWSER IS TAKING OVER), discuss our Now Playing (with a love-hate CompileHeart relationship), and have a heavy dose of fun feedback.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 492: “Roving Bands Of Nursenaries”
episodes.description: It’s a cozy foursome on the RPGCast this week. Discussing the highs and lows of their now playing. But in the end, we are left wondering, what the heck is a “nursenary?”

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 491: “But I’m 18!”
episodes.description: So this is actually Episode 491 because "Game Of The Year" was 490. After the show, Anna Marie and Chris got Taco Bell. Johnathan got distracted from his review. Josh got arrested by the feds. And Alex got the worst punishment of all, more Kingdom Hearts.

episodes.title: RPGCast – “Game Of The Year 2018”
episodes.description: It's time for way too many people to get on a Skype call and debate the following. How much is Wheels is wrong? What decade will the Final Fantasy VII remake will come out? And most importantly, what did we do to deserve Metal Max Xeno and The Witch and the Hundred Knight 2?

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 489: “Fulfilling Their Destiny”
episodes.description: Before the rush of releases at the end of January, we talk about your feedback, our briefs turn into longer discussions, and we get really confused about a new...farming...eSport?!

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 488: “Hey There’s A Spider Down Here!”
episodes.description: A surprise disappointment in our Now Playing, a surprise announcement in the News, and Chris shouting ELDER SCROLLS really loudly in the briefs (and beyond)...
categories: Fairy Fencer F: Advent Dark Force
Monster Boy and the Cursed Kingdom
The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 487: “FIGHT IT OUT”
episodes.description: This week's cast has Pascal and Johnathan discussing their holiday gameplay time as well as whether Octopath Traveler is worth a second look. Also, Chris gets really frustrated about Atelier games and Anna Marie gets really frustrated with Chris.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 486: “Stuck On Some Yoshi Fight”
episodes.description: Welcome to the new year! We played a lot of games over the holiday break – some new, some old. We also talk about your gaming goals and two upcoming RPGamer features. Please be excited.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 485: “The Christmas Zone Treaty”
episodes.description: Happy Holidays!  We wrap up the final podcast of the year affirming it's OK for Anna Marie to play casual games, even if Chris disagrees.  While Josh and Kelley are making New Year's resolutions, Chris also disagrees about what should be a brief story. We'll see everyone in 2019!

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 484: “Massassin’s Creed”
episodes.description: Chris and Pascal fail at tactics. Josh gets some bartending skills. And actually that's it. Except for our new game coming to the Epic Games Store! No not really, but we were feeling left out.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 483: “Agent Squeaker”
episodes.description: The podcast goes a little potty-mouthed as Chris complains about waiting for his Christmas gift, Anna Marie complains about hard games, and we discuss the mess that is Fallout 76 (and its collector's edition).  What a weird two weeks!

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 482: “#NotMyDetective”
episodes.description: Two long-gone cast members return this week as we discuss Pokémon, a huge amount of FFXIV news, and some curious info about E3. It's way too early, but there it is. Happy Thanksgiving - we'll be back in two weeks.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 481: “Hairy Man-Back Makes Me Hungry”
episodes.description: Things go off the rail before we get to the meat of the show. But we pull it together to discuss what we've been playing, too many Compile Heart games, and a potential dungeon crawling disaster.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 480: “The Quick And The Saddled”
episodes.description: It's Extra Life 2018. As Chris repeatedly dies in Dark Souls III, we discuss Blizzcon and the first wave of upcoming November releases.

episodes.title: RPGCast – Episode 475: “God Otter”
episodes.description: Chris is merely a man. If you prick him, does he not bleed? If you give him two awkwardly full bottles of soda, does he not spill them on his laptop and require an expensive repair? And if you give him a cup of coffee after that repair, does not his cat spill it on the same laptop and break it again? What? Oh, those last two aren't normal? Oh, I guess he is an idiot then.
